repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.6-slim-stretch

RUN apt update && apt install --no-install-recommends -y python3-dev gcc && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install pytorch and fastai
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir torch_nightly -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir fastai

# Install starlette and uvicorn
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir starlette uvicorn python-multipart aiohttp

ADD app.py app.py
ADD stage-2.pth /tmp

# Run it once to trigger resnet download
RUN python app.py

EXPOSE 8008

# Start the server
CMD ["python", "app.py", "serve"]
